Nombrando un Vector

```{r}

roulette_vector <- c(-24, -50, 100, -350, 10)

names(poker_vector) <- c("Monday","Tuesday","Wednesday","Thursday","Friday")
poker_vector

names(roulette_vector) <- c("Monday","Tuesday","Wednesday","Thursday","Friday")
roulette_vector

```
Comparando y Seleccionando

```{r}
age <- 17
result <- age >= 18
result

A_vector <- c(1,2,3)
b_vector <- c(4,5,6)

total_vector <- A_vector + b_vector

total_vector

total_daily

total_poker <- sum(poker_vector)
total_poker

total_roulette <- sum(roulette_vector)

sum_total <- sum(total_poker , total_roulette)
sum_total 

poker_vector
poker_vector[3]
poker_vector[c(1,3,4)]

roulette_vector[2:5]

selection_vector

poker_winning_days
```

Matrices
```{r}
matrix(1:9, byrow=TRUE,nrow=3)
```


```{r}
new_hope <- c(460.998,314.4)
empire_strike <- c(2980.475, 247.900)
return_jedi <- c(309.306 , 165.8)

box_office <- c(new_hope, empire_strike,return_jedi)
box_office

star_wars_matrix <- matrix (box_office, byrow = TRUE, nrow = 3)
star_wars_matrix

region <- c("US", "non-US")
titles <- c("A new Hope","The Empire Strikes Back","Return of the Jedi")

colnames(star_wars_matrix) <- region
rownames(star_wars_matrix) <- titles

star_wars_matrix

```

RowSums()
```{r}
worldwide_vector <- rowSums(star_wars_matrix)
worldwide_vector
all_wars_variable <- cbind(star_wars_matrix, worldwide_vector)
all_wars_variable

worldwide_cols <- colSums(all_wars_variable)
worldwide_cols

all_wars_variable_1 <- rbind(all_wars_variable, worldwide_cols)
all_wars_variable_1
```

Selección de elementos de una matriz, tambien deja la busqueda por el string del nombre

```{r}
non_us_all <- all_wars_variable_1[,2]
non_us_all
us_all <- all_wars_variable_1[,1]
us_all

non_us_all_1 <- all_wars_variable_1[1:3,2]
non_us_all_1


mean(non_us_all)
mean(us_all)
```

Factores
```{r}
sex_vector <- c("Male", "Female", "Female", "Male")
factor_sex_vector <- factor(sex_vector)
factor_sex_vector
temperature_vector <- c("High", "Low","High","Low", "Medium")
factor_temperature_vector <- factor(temperature_vector, order=TRUE, levels=c("Low","Medium","High"))
factor_temperature_vector

```
Factor levels

```{r}
survey_vector <- c("M","F","F","M","M")
factor_survey_vector <- factor(survey_vector)
factor_survey_vector

levels(factor_survey_vector) <- c("Female", "Male")
factor_survey_vector

```
sumarizing a factor
```{r}
summary(survey_vector)
summary(factor_survey_vector)
male <- factor_survey_vector[1]
male
female <- factor_survey_vector[2]
female

speed_vector <- c("medium","slow", "slow","medium","fast")
factor_speed_Vector <- factor(speed_vector, ordered = TRUE,levels = c("slow","medium","fast"))
factor_speed_Vector

da3 <- factor_speed_Vector[1]
da2
da3

da2>da3
```
